MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Polmont. Following a temporary repair earlier this evening, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00pm due to an underground cable fault outside 52 Rodel Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30pm on Monday, 15 February 2021
